website_summaries.verdict: This poncho-style coat is better for long-haired breeds that don't need added warmth.
pros: Lightweight water-resistant polyester shell with water-resistant polyurethane coating
Leash access button-hole design with storm flap cover
Comes in a variety of colors and sizes
Tucks into a convenient carrying pouch.Lightweight hood
cons: Waist strap is highly adjustable, so focus on length, not width, when choosing a size

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this rain coat is great. It stays on and the fit is adjustable. I got the XL for my 55lb Boxer mix and it fit fine. The girth is really adjustable with a wide velcro band, so you want to buy according to your dog's body length so you can shield them from the rain. Love the ducky pattern! One thing I'm worried about is washing it. It's really thin plastic so I'm not sure if it can hold up to a washer machine. Will probably have to hand wash and lay out to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kao

customer_reviews.title: shocking revelation: my dog will now go out in the rain
customer_reviews.text: I had all sorts of trepidation, but my rescue Chihuahua would never go out in the rain...he waited 20 hours one time. This is comfortable for him; he does not shake it off nor does he mind wearing it. And it keeps him dry. We are all happy now here. Try it; you'll be pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: My Hummel OpinionTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, does the job! Fits a pit/mastiff perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy!!!! We have tried on several raincoats at the store for our girl and none of them fit well and not to mention are very pricey. This coat was light weight, and is true to its size! We bought the xl and it fit our 60# pit/Mastiff like it was made for her!! Con: I with the hood was a smidge deeper so it would stay on better but it really only falls back when she tips her head back! Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a S for my 10lbs miniature pinscher. Fit him perfectly. Light material and super easy to put on the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money (Size XL)
customer_reviews.text: I was recently in the mountains on a RV trip and it was pouring rain. My dog and I were on a two mile hike so I had the opportunity to use this product in extreme conditions. It performed like a champ. The raincoat stayed in place and kept my dog's body dry. The hood didn't stay in place but I think that was because he would stop and shake the water off his nose and tail every 10 minutes or so. I found this raincoat easy to put on and take off of my dog and it was very pliable. Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: This was an epic fail. See my b4 and ...
customer_reviews.text: This was an epic fail. See my b4 and after photos during a 25 minute walk in light rain. The hood doesn't stay on and every time my dog would shake the coat, it would fold up on his back. Plus side is Amazon refunded without me having to even send it back.
customer_reviews.author: rooster_ranch

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: People laughed when I posted photo of my photo of my beloved Raven in her new raincoat but it sure kept her dry when we had 3 inches of rain in one day when we had a vet appointment to keep. You need to make sure you put it on securely and then it does it job. I like it has a hood.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Seriously?!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe what i received. The largest size folds up into a 4" × 5" × 1" pouch. Very cheaply made, nothing but thin lightweight plastic. If you have a moderately active dog, it won't make it through the first use without tearing. Save your money. I could make a better one with heavy plastic and duct tape for pennies. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn S

customer_reviews.title: She doesn't like the rain and so it's great to have this ...
customer_reviews.text: This rain coat has come in handy more than once. I bought the XL size for my 50 lbs Pit mix, Pebbles, and she has no issues wearing it. She doesn't like the rain and so it's great to have this coat to cover her up. It is very quick and easy to put on. Just 2 buttons near the throat and a velcro closure under the belly. Now, of course, the hood won't stay on, but I am more concerned about protecting her body. She can easily go and do her business outside, with the coat on. I am very happy with this poncho and I'm glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Celtica

customer_reviews.title: so cute and fits well!
customer_reviews.text: This poncho is so cute. It's made of a thin nylon fabric that is (the underside) coated in a waterproof rubber. The belly strap has Velcro, and there are multiple snaps that secure under the neck. The little flap at the back of the neck is perfect for clipping a leash, although I have no problem clipping my dog's leash in the front--we use this poncho for potty breaks outside, we don't go for walks in the rain--which is when you'd probably want to use the little leash flap. The XL fits my dog perfectly. Her measurements are: *neck to base of tail: 21" *around the neck: 18" *around the chest, under the armpits: 28"
customer_reviews.author: kittykatty

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't slide!
customer_reviews.text: This rain jacket is cool for many reasons. Firstly it fits into its small bag which a great space saver. Secondly it's not heavy at all so my dog doesn't hate it. Lastly it fits just right so that it doesn't slide when she's walking! I loved it so much I bought a second one for my other dog! I would absolutely buy this again. I forgot to mention that I have to oddly shaped dogs and the size chart they had actually worked for them. I have a very short legged 30 pound long dog who fits into a large. I also have a very tall 80 pound dog who fits into an extra extra large. Hope that helps!
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dog rain poncho for my very large (100+ lbs) Great Pyrenees. The XXX Large fits him perfectly. It's quick and easy to put on him and stays in place quite well. This poncho keeps him very dry--even after a 30 minute walk in the rain. I do have to dry off his feet (obviously), but he doesn't need to shake off after wearing it. I keep a clean house, and better smelling dog!
customer_reviews.author: Holly J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a homeless man and his yellow lab. He takes really good care of her and I wanted her to keep dry when it rains. He says it worked perfect for her and she stayed dry and warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: The XXS Fits my 5lb maltese PERFECTLY. Plus, he looks absolutely adorable in it. Bought one for my dad's chihuahua, too. She isn't so sure about it, but she is a bit of a princess so that's not the poncho's fault ;)
customer_reviews.author: D. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport and keep for spur of the moment
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and fit my 70 lb American staffordshire well. Easy to transport and keep for spur of the moment use
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Internet Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I got a size medium for my 18 lb. dog, and it's a perfect fit. He doesn't love clothes, but he is pretty comfortable in this. He wouldn't go out in the rain before, but this poncho does the trick. It has a little hole near the neck for the leash to connect to the collar which is nice. It is secure and adjustable to fit, so when he shakes, it doesn't slip around. I washed it on cold in the delicate cycle, and it was fine! It air dried quickly too. My only complaint is that when the hood is down, he sometimes can't see, so I have to adjust it every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight rain jacket; Not for windy days
customer_reviews.text: I like this as a lighter weight alternative to her heavier plastic raincoat (which tends to shift to one side due to the weight). I got a large for my stocky 60 pound dog and it fits just right, maybe just a smidge short. Because it is lightweight it is not good in windy conditions- it easily blows around/flips up. Love the color- nice and bright! It took a while for the wrinkles to release and I leave it hanging to avoid re-wrinkling. Overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen C.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out for us
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could return but will keep for the car, for emergencies. This was not good for our daily walks on rainy days. Material is very lightweight but wasn’t surprised because of the price. It would have been perfect if... the back and hood would stay in place in the wind. Also, it would shift to one side during the walk. Our dog walks on a heel and perhaps if the leash opening was on the side rather than the top, would solve the problem(?). Will be continuing a search for a better raincoat. (Size fit well on our Golden)
customer_reviews.author: Ccc

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this raincoat for my pug, who hates going outside to do his business in the rain. It fit him great (no easy feat with a barrel-chested pug), but we only got two uses out of it. When I put it on him the third time, one of the snaps fell off and there is a tear in the coat where the snap had been. The snaps are a little difficult to undo, so my thought is that the fabric is not strong enough to hold up to the snap being pulled apart. Very disappointed in the quality of this raincoat!
customer_reviews.author: E.L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice functional raincoat
customer_reviews.text: Nice functional raincoat. Keeps the dogs dry in the rain, much nicer than toweling off after every outing. Material serves the purpose but is fairly thin/lightweight so would likely tear easily if snagged. Ordered three sizes for three different dogs and all fit as expected/advertised. Birth strap is forward enough that make dogs can relieve themselves without interference. Hood is awkward/useless so I just fold it back out of the way. Main shortcoming is a lack of rear leg loops...if the rain is accompanied by any wind at all, the lightweight material billows up in the back like a loose cape and no longer does its job. I will likely retrofit leg loops to solve this problem.
customer_reviews.author: ChelleB

customer_reviews.title: Mambo approved!
customer_reviews.text: My brother's dog Mambo hates the rain and doesn't like to go outside when it is raining. Sometimes, she would go all day refusing to go outside. I surprised them with the coat and Mambo loved it! She goes out in the rain without any problems now and looks super cute, too. UPDATE: My brother put her in this and tied a red balloon to her for Halloween! Mambo was the cutest Georgie in town.
customer_reviews.author: Halee Marie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fit great - looks adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Love the double snaps and velcro on this little rain slicker. My Boston Terrier puppy refuses to go outside in the rain. He’s being quite the polly prissy pants. I love it has access for his leash and covers him completely. Its a little big right now but he’s only 5lbs and growing everyday. I bought a Small, knowing I will need to use it a lot this spring. Not to mention this thing is absolutely adorable! He wasn’t too pleased to put on another outfit but once it was on it was fine. Lots of room to stretch, grow, and adjust on these. And it came with a carry pouch for on the go!
customer_reviews.author: MichelleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work well in the wind
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this, they only had a few sizes small, medium, and large... I see they have updated their sizing chart which is great because a Large did not fit my chocolate lab at all and she is only 50 pounds. It fit better on her backwards so the hood was covering her butt... Anyways... It is super thin and is awful in the wind. I would not recommend this product form my experience of having a very active 2 year old chocolate lab
customer_reviews.author: Opk

customer_reviews.title: adorable and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have a cockapoo that hates going out when it rains, so I bought this poncho to see if it would help. He doesnt mind wearing it at all (heck, I'd say he even looks happy now going out in the rain - look at the pics, looks like he is smiling! haha) and it keeps him mostly dry. He even keeps the hood on! He is probably about 15 pounds and small-framed like a cockerspaniel and the large fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Book Geek

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and tears easily but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and tears easily but does the job! Snaps in the front and Velcro under the front legs. It comes in a small little snap pouch so you can roll it up again and keep it in this small portable pouch. Very useful! I ordered an XL and I have a boarder collie/ Aussi mix who is 45lbs with a rather long back. The XL fit him perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve N.

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Keeps doggie dry for the most part topside. She won't put up with the hood. Her feet splash water on her underside - but not terribly so. This also splashes dirt on the underside of the raincoat. This dirt is easily wiped away with damp cloth or sponge - except on the Velcro part. Snaps at front (of chest) are very hard to pull apart and I'm always worried that I'm going to tear the plastic coat, or the carrying pouch. These could have been Velcro like the cinch strap around the belly. Were it not for these difficult snaps, this would be a 5-star rating
customer_reviews.author: GKPugh

customer_reviews.title: Cute little poncho
customer_reviews.text: This cute little poncho does work for keeping my chihuahua dry, but sizing is a problem - it’s very long for a small, and although the neck jay barely fits , the Velcro belt is very long, should be able to secure tighter - it swims. Also, hood should have a fastener to keep back , the slit for the leash should be further along the back for the harness to fit through- my pup actually had the entire poncho & harness come off the back while she was struggling to not go out in the rain. Also, I k is it’s cheap but the snaps under the neck are only a moment away from ripping off.
customer_reviews.author: JBZ

customer_reviews.title: The hood fits and the length is perfect. It's exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 60lb Lab/Pitbull, and he looks so handsome. He hates rain, and refuses to go outside if it's raining, but with his rain jacket he will now go out long enough to potty. The hood fits and the length is perfect. It's exactly what I wanted, and for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Ripped when he tried it on!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT RECOMMEND Initially I was excited. It was cute. It had a little bag so It can easily be packed up which I love since I travel with my dog a lot. I have a standard poodle and got an xl so it covers his pom pom tail. I probably should have gotten a large but I’m still happy with the fit. He tried it on and I was going to take it off. And the snap ripped. FIRST TIME. Just trying it on. It’s cute but it sucks it already ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: A windbreaker that keeps the Chill away and Dry
customer_reviews.text: This is a windbreaker that keeps the chill out from the wind and our little guy dry. He grew out of first one and now in his 2nd jacket. He is 13 lbs , size small fits perfect! He does not mind wearing it :) (He wore XS when he was 10 lbs)
customer_reviews.author: TAT

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: I measured my dog and bought this raincoat according to the size chart provided by the company and it is HUGE on him. His length and chest circumference were clearly in the XL range, but the jacket is not wearable. The hood doesn't stay back and continuously covers his eyes. The back length is so long it goes over his butt, which means my dog's tail is covered. I'm very disappointed and will look for a different company to get a raincoat from.
customer_reviews.author: Cristin

customer_reviews.title: I have a corgi and got a large size (according ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a corgi and got a large size (according to the length in the size chart) and it fits him perfectly. His ears are just too big to stay under the hood
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and functional
customer_reviews.text: This raincoat is absolutely adorable and functional. It is the only outerwear I've ever purchased for my dog that is actually long enough for his whole body. The hood covers his eyes a bit when on, but we just don't put that part down over his head and he's fine. He's also a total pill about snapping or buckling things around his neck, so I fasten the neck opening and then pull it over his head to avoid the struggle. Works like a charm, and did I mention that it's adorable? He is an 11lb terrier mix pictured wearing a size small.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great coat!
customer_reviews.text: Light material raincoat (has no heavy lining). Not thin like a garbage bag poncho but not as thick as a person's light raincoat. Works perfect for those pouring days when you just need to throw on a protective layer on your pup. Blew up a little in the back tail area when it was windy but not a huge deal. Leash access hole falls on your dog somewhere between collar lenght and harness length, just had my dog where the coat a little lower so I could hook her harness up and it still covered her whole body and most of her head. Can't do better for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The poncho arrives in a neat little carrying pouch complete with a snap loop to attach it to the leash. Fit as expected. Very lightweight and does not bother my dog at all. I like that the slit in the coat for the collar loop, from the harness or collar, has an additional flap to cover the opening. Some dog raincoats have a huge hood, which usually flops around and does no good keeping the rain of the head. This hood is well proportioned and fits. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Imafallin Cantgetup

customer_reviews.title: Not the best ponchos for greyhounds.
customer_reviews.text: I have two greyhounds and I ordered the suggested XXL for the size of my dogs. However - the XXL only covers 3/4 of their back....and the coat slips and slides from side to side as we walk...there's no getting the coat to stay put. And forget about using the hood...completely useless. On the plus side, most of their back and underside is dry when we come back into the house. They were cheap, so i'll keep using them...I just need to find something for their poor heads. And a way to keep the darn things from sliding.
customer_reviews.author: B. Weatherspoon

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Designed
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint about this raincoat is the hood. It is too big and always falls over my dog's eyes, so that I constantly need to tuck in the front edge so that she isn't blinded. (The raincoat isn't too big for her--in fact, it isn't even long enough to completely cover the back of her body.) My other major complaint is that it's very light with no weighting or any way to fasten down the back end, so that in strong wind (which often accompanies rain, of course) the back end flies up, leaving her rear end exposed. On the plus side, it looks nice, and the material is truly waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: RealGood

customer_reviews.title: Cute. Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very lightweight and packs into a small pouch. It did fit by dogs chest but not long enough in the body (she is very long). So accuracy on measurements I would say are good but I would definitely go up one size if your dog is in between sizes or weight fluctuates. The hood doesn't really work and isn’t really functional, probably more for overall appearance than anything. Very thin cheap material - but thats what makes it so compact and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Caz

customer_reviews.title: Great Rain Poncho for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. Overtime, any dog rain jacket wears out and this product is no exception. I find I need a new one each year. The price of this jacket is so reasonable, that I replace it with another. My dog is very hard on rain jackets and we live in a very rainy climate so I get my money's worth. I recommend this jacket to anyone. Note on sizing: I buy a larger size than with other rain jackets with this product. Since it is a poncho, I can get one that covers my long border collie and it still fits her normal size girth around her chest.
customer_reviews.author: Miz Eliz

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend's dog. Fit is good and it is cute! Will keep the doggie much drier when out in the rain. Light weight, good for summer and could put a jacket underneath for winter wear. Easily fits in the little matching bag. Easy to put on and off, no straps around the legs just snaps at the neck and Velcro under the belly.
customer_reviews.author: Rural ID.nurseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not practical
customer_reviews.text: Truly disappointing... I purchased an XS for my ten pound cockapoo a few years ago to shield her from that dreadful precipitation. She looked absolutely adorable, but by the time we got back from our walk, she was completely soaked. The jacket only covers her back, leaving her stomach and behind exposed. The cute little hood that should protect her face is poorly designed and completely covers her eyes, not that it stays on anyway. A garbage bag would do a better job. It's a shame because it's a great price and is actually a pretty good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: amateur

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dog dry.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 110lb german shepherd/mastiff mix and the XXXL is long enough to cover his body and most of his tail. He probably could have gotten away with an XXL My dog has a low tolerance for things on him, he hates bandanas, but he hates being wet even more so he wears this. It keeps him dry and has a nice hole for the leash to attach to his collar. It is thin so not made for keeping a dog warm. It fits in a small pouch for ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline STop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material but sizing incorrect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality of a rain coat as for the material but the accuracy of the sizing not so much. I didn't return it because the length is a good length for my pup but as for the velcro under his belly its WAY TO BIG! So I will be modifying it to fit him. But for 12 bucks you can't really complain much. It's super cute in my pup. And will serve the purpose of keeping him dry on then rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Adorable and Functional Puppy Raincoat!
customer_reviews.text: This is SO cute. I got the S for my French Bulldog puppy (4 months old, 14 lbs); it fits perfectly (and it was also manageable and wearable when he was smaller, too), and it provides coverage when we walk him outside in NYC on rainy days! It's also a no frills jacket-option that has a velcro opening right under the hood and around the belly, which works well for a growing dog or generally, for a longer term of use than some other options on the market! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: He wasn't too crazy about it the first couple of times I put it on him, but he's a smart dude and figured out if it's raining, I gotta wear this! If he gets wet on his walk, it takes forever to get him dry, so this is a huge help. The hood part is very generous; had to fold it back a bit so he could see where he's going. Now he doesn't mind it at all, and gets lots of compliments! If you measure and order the right size, this works perfect for kepping the puppy dry!
customer_reviews.author: DreamchaserTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Ever.
customer_reviews.text: My dog refuses, absolutely REFUSES to go outside if it's raining. There's no nudging him out, there's no coaxing, no amount of tasty treats could convince my handsome boy to venture out in the cold, cold rain. Then mama bought him a cute little raincoat as a last ditch effort to save my floors from potty accidents, and it WORKED! My pup has a huge head, so my only complaint is the length of the hood... he manages to get it to drop every time and we have to stop and re-adjust before we continue our rainy walks. Otherwise, this is just the cutest thing and it's super easy to rinse off / keep clean!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I got my cocker spaniel this raincoat because she hates being walked when it's raining. I ordered a large for her and it fits her just about right. She measures 16" in length so it's a tiny bit long on her but it works perfectly. I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: RAQUEL S PAUTH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome color and worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have a Red Australian Shepherd dog (red healer) and the XL worked perfect on her! The only thing I did not get, that I wanted, was for the under-carriage to velcro the length of her body. This was the case in a previous rain coat I'd ordered and had to return because of size.
customer_reviews.author: B.J. Ward

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on my dog as soon as it was delivered. She looked adorable! However, as soon as I took it off and unsnapped the front buttons it ripped. See attached photo. The length was great, she’s a runt 85# Great Pyr/Retriever mix and the XXXL was long enough, but way too wide in the girth. I would have had to tie it instead of the Velcro. Not worth the money since I couldn’t even officially use it even once! I’ll try to make my own out of a legit poncho. Such a bummer since the yellow is vibrant and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Spitfire

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Easy, Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This is the best raincoat I was able to find for my dog. Because of the velcro design, it will fit almost any shape dog, and it is easy to put on/take off. My dog is not a fan of the rain (or being wet afterwards). So this little coat gives her a little more time to do her business without getting too wet. I haven't used it yet, but it comes with a little carrying bag that you could attach to a leash or backpack if you are on a long walk or trip and think it might rain.
customer_reviews.author: Jaguar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rain jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, and so does my pup! It keeps my fur baby dry, has a covered hole for a leash, a super cute pattern, and even has a carrying case that you can clip to your leash! I have a 20 pound standard weenie dog, so finding things that will fit around, that arent too short for his long back without being too big is almost impossible. The medium fit him perfectly! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my German Shepard. It’s very cute, good quality. However- Not functional. It needs a strap for under the belly to keep the cape from sliding to the side. It kept sliding over and tripping her. I guess if I had a halter to put OVER this, it would work and hold it into place.
customer_reviews.author: Syndel Valle

customer_reviews.title: When in doubt, size up
customer_reviews.text: My dog was on the upper-end of a small according to the sizing chart, but after trying it on it's clear he needs a medium. The small technically fits, but since the fabric doesn't have any give and it's snug across his chest, he can't really move his front legs with it on. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality though, it seems really well made for the price. And it comes in a cute little pouch you can clip onto your leash :) We'll try again with the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Marley Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Choose a heavier and longer product.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best. Too small for the terror I purchased it for. It's so thin it folds over with the slightest breeze. My old dog had a nice thick yellow raincoat. He wouldn't go out in the rain without it. It was long enough to keep him dry. And heavy enough to stay put. This one is not long enough. Its so light it folds over just behind the chest strap leaving the back exposed to rain. The hood is not designed for use. It's ornamental.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Order an XXL for a golden retriever
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the XL for my 65lb golden retriever and it's too small 😆 I think he's a bit chunkier than I realized. It's about 4 inches too short towards his rump, and the strap under his belly is too tight. I'm still giving it 5 stars because I bought the pink paws pattern many years ago for my other dog and it's held up well over time. It's light weight, easily goes back into its bag, and keeps my dog dry. Just order the XXL if you have a golden retriever.
customer_reviews.author: JoShmo

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Light Weight Rain Coat
customer_reviews.text: What a Cute Light weight rain coat. The hood actually can go on my pup's head! There are snaps for the neck, and a verco for under the belly. I love the feature of snaps around the neck instead of verco( has two sets of snaps) I ordered a large for my puggle, which is a bit big, but could aways be worn with a sweather underneath it for when it's cold. I used it today when it rain, and everything except his paws was dry, Perfect! I will for sure order another one for my puggle.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: So cute, perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Okay. I am absolutely in love with this raincoat!!! My dog is used to wearing shirts, sweatshirts, Thundershirt, etc so I didn’t have much trouble getting it on at all. I bought him an XL Rubber Ducky raincoat. (I always base my sizing off of pictures of dogs who look similar to him. NOT the advice given by the company. I’ve found reviews with pictures are much more helpful.) He is a 55 pound lab mix and it fits him perfectly. I am so happy to have something so convenient and cute for my lil man on rainy days! Plus, I mean he’s hella cute in it.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline’s Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Did what I hoped it would
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use this the for the first time this morning on my dog, Harry, who is hound shaped. The hood doesn't really work on him, its more entertaining than anything. But the jacket part worked on keeping his back pretty dry in the middle of a REALLY heavy rainstorm. It snaps at the neck and then has Velcro around the belly. You can try to thread a leash thru the back, but I used a harness over it. I like that it has a little snap baggy you can put it in when you aren't using it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anne-Marie G

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to measure for sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Nice slicker. Even though my dog is medium-sized, I ordered an XL and it fits perfectly. I was surprised that he didn't mind the hood and I put the slicker on over his jacket so he could be warm AND dry and it worked fine. My only concern is the snaps on the neck pieces. They snap very firmly and I think they should be unsnapped with care or they will soon tear loose from the thin fabric. That's why a 4 star rather than 5. Plus, he's only worn it once. For the price it's a good product. It does fold very small into its case which fit easily into a pocket, pack, or purse.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Beware of awkward French bulldog sizings
customer_reviews.text: Product is of good quality. My frenchie has bigger chest and has awkward proportions. Based on the size chart it said to buy a medium but because I read the reviews saying it runs small I bought a large. But it was way too big, everytime he peed I had to lift the poncho up to make sure it didn't get dirty. The chest area fits but the length of the overall poncho is too long. Returning to get a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This rain poncho did a great job! It is extremely lightweight so if you are wanting something for the cold this is not the product for you but I love using it in the warmer temps because it keeps my dog dry but also doesn't add too much warmth. I love that it can be folded up into a little pouch because I can throw it in my bag if we go out & it starts to rain! It seems to be pretty sturdy & decent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Clair

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Just what it looks like! I love the color. Super light weight which is perfect for my golden retrieved who doesn't need any added warmth, and folds up very small. I purchased the XXL for my 7 month old golden. and it is a bit to big for him, but it'll do until he grows into it. Should fit him perfectly when he is full grown.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t want a wet dog??
customer_reviews.text: I love this poncho and my dog doesn’t mind it either! My dog looks super cute in it. The hood doesn’t stay on but it’s ok because he isn’t soaking wet when we come in from walking in the rain! My dog is 30lbs and very “chesty” so this is perfect because it Velcro’s around the belly and neck, he wears a harness over it when we walk. I got my dog a medium and my moms chiweenie a small. This came in handy during hurricane season in Florida this summer.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.R.

customer_reviews.title: OKAY but.... those buttons!
customer_reviews.text: The jacket itself did its job but since its so light, i would've recommended a double strap on the bottom. The tail end of the coat tends to get flappy in the wind. Secondly, the buttons around the neck are simply horrible. Once you snap them in, they are a PAIN to unsnap. I accidentally ended up tearing the buttons right out of the jacket because of how difficult they were to remove. Unfortunately, I had t return the jacket due to these deficiencies.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Cute patterns and a great price. I like that it comes with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute patterns and a great price. I like that it comes with a small pouch with a snapping loop so you can keep it compact and throw it in a purse or bag to have just in case. It is impractical and doesn't stay in place very well in high winds however. I have found the back part that isn't secured will fly up and make it kind of pointless. (Since the material is thin). Nevertheless, in light to medium rain with low wind, it has kept my dog dry and made her hate me slightly less for forcing her to go outside in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: chem grad student

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these ponchos.
customer_reviews.text: I like these ponchos. And I think my puppies appreciate them too - they are more willing to walk on a rainy day. For the price, it’s perfect especially since my pups are still growing. I hope I could use these when they are full grown too. I’m in California so we don’t have rain too often (sadly) Sure - the small pup can’t see when I put the hood on. Just needed to adjust. If there are wind gusts the poncho will fly up - maybe there’s a way to secure them better See my video and pics!
customer_reviews.author: Goodol10

customer_reviews.title: So adorable! Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is SO CUTE!! My puppy is around 13lbs and it’s still a little too big for him but he’ll definitely grow into it some more! The little hood and the duck print on it is so adorable. It is in great condition for the price and colors are vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Emma laird

customer_reviews.title: It’s hilarious
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 55 lb boxer. I didn’t measure her for this. I took the advice from another reviewer and got the XL. Its a little loose but I think the large would be tight. This has been useful and most of all, hilarious. I can’t help but smile every time she has to walk around in this lol. She hates getting rained on. The hood does not cover her head, not sure if it’s supposed to. It’s awesome either way. My fave part is the little pouch you can keep it in! Can be clipped right on the leash. I lost the first one when I moved and bought another one immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Dunphy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our rainy day walks 💕
customer_reviews.text: We are having a very wet year so far in Southern California. This has been a great solution for helping to keep my little Josie dry on our walks. She doesn’t mind it much. It’s very lightweight & secures well with the 2 snaps under her chin & the adjustable Velcro belly strap. It dries quickly & I love how it fits in it’s compact little sleeve. I keep it clipped to her leash so it’s always handy. She weighs about 13lbs & I followed the instructions for measuring & the medium fit perfect. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Truly Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love this lightweight raincoat
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. I am very careful not to yank hard on the neck snaps because it looks like the coat could tear easily. Coat folds up very small in its enclosed cover. This coat has received ALOT of use lately, and my cocker puppy seems totally undaunted by heavy rain when he is wearing it. There is a convenient slit for his leash so I put it on over his Puppia harness.Just be aware that it is very lightweight and not lined.
customer_reviews.author: TechnoPhobia

customer_reviews.title: So cute. Can’t stand it.
customer_reviews.text: My bulldog is 10mos and nearly 60lbs. I got a size X-LARGE Honestly the adorable factor alone is worth the money for this.. and in general it’s perfect.. quality is fine although one of the front snaps got stuck closed and is now dangling on only one side.. so.. I’m down to one snap (seller if you’re reading this and wanna send a replacement that would be awesome!) but otherwise this thing is so frickin cute and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Chrisman

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works perfectly but putting it on is work!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheap. Yes the price lets you know that, but when you open it up, it just likes like a sheet cut into the shape of a jacket/coat instead of actually being one. It actually works quite well and stayed on my dog. It even looks really cute! But it can be a bit of a hassle to get your dog to stay still while you figure out which neck buttons to use and where along the belly should the strap should be while also making sure her butt is covered. May want to get something a little more expensive to save yourself and your pooch some stress and hassle.
customer_reviews.author: James The Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Effective Rain Coat
customer_reviews.text: This coat is a thin material that folds into a pouch. I haven’t had issues getting the coat back into the pouch as other reviewers have stated. Although it’s a lightweight material, it’s a great little rain coat for potty breaks or walks in light rain. I ordered a size bigger for my dog so that the coat would drape down over her more, and it’s an added bonus that she looks super cute in the coat.
customer_reviews.author: A. RoachTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Raincoat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our 4 lb. toy poodle puppy. Fit is good except can't get the hood to stay on his head but we have had that problem with our past dogs and keeping the hood on their heads with their raincoats. Easy to put on with the snaps in the front and velcro under his belly. Back is long enough that it goes all the way to his tail. Keeps him dry. Is very lightweight and dries quickly. Cute colors and goes back in the pouch for storage or to take along on walks.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run very small
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and have had one for my dog for several years. I recently bought an XL for a friend'd dog but the velcro strap wouldn't go around her abdomen. Her dog is a black lab, and not a particularly large one. I have had to return it and am purchasing the XXL. Also, those who complain about the snaps at the neck: Just leave the snaps snapped together and put the poncho on over the dogs head. Not only is it much easier, but it stops all wear and tear on the snaps and material.
customer_reviews.author: Delaine

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS. It is soo cute on my dog ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS. It is soo cute on my dog and helps keep her dry. The simple closure around the neck and waist are perfect because they don't make my dog uncomfortable. It is light weight and folds nicely in a little pouch. Will be buying more :) If anyone needs a sizing reference, I have a terrier mutt that is 19lb and has a 17.5" chest. I got a small and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great to have for those rainy days
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my little pom. Came in very handy during this very rainy winter. The small size fits her perfectly. I bought one for her and a medium for my Camara shy mini border collie. Fits them both just right. Easy to put on and off. Really does keep them from getting wet. Wind didn't blow the rain coats of either. Velcro bottom and front adjustable buttons secure the coats in place. Saves them from getting wet on rainy days/nights when they have to go take care of business. Really worth the money. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: onlineshopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Tore on First Try
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 pd Maltipoo. After 1 use, when I went to unbotton the neck portion of the jacket, it tore. Thin material and not quality. I would not recommend buying unless you are extremely careful upon putting on/pulling off. It also moved as my dog walked, so dirt just got under the jacket, even though I kept adjusting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Good price!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dog months ago and I'm so glad I did! We've been having rain up here in New England like no one's business and it's nice to know my dog is kept safe and dry and more importantly, less wiping down when we come in! My dog is about 55lbs but his weight fluctuates. I got a double X Large but it's a bit big. He could have lived with the Xlarge but he's not swimming in it either. Loses a star because it does tend to slide around when he is wearing it, but again that could be because it's a smidge too big.
customer_reviews.author: PaigeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I liked it in the beginning except that the rain coat is very thin so if it is raining hard it will soak through the coat. Kind of defeats the purpose of it... After using it for only a few months, the buttons broke off when I tried to take it off. I have bought three of these (I have three dogs) and two of them have one button that has already broken off and both buttons have come off on the third one. I've had these coats for less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!! A must buy for any dog owner...
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost: Mini dachshund 10 lbs purchased XS. Perfect fit around his girth but of course not quite long enough for his length. #wienerdogproblems. Lab/pitty mix. 70+ lbs. purchased XXL. Perfect. The price for a nice rain coat is at least twice this price at ur big box pet stores. I tried the plastic raincoats before but they tore within 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: RVA mom

customer_reviews.title: Lite duty/simple/does the job
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this rain jacket is great for my dog. We don’t often take long walks in heavy rain but I’m trying to change that as we get lazy during our long rainy season here in the PNW -it’s not a super heavy duty which for my dog is good because she gets hot-I found that if you slide the hood through the dogs collar, and then over their head-it stays on pretty good. If we overuse it then I’ll spend a little more on one that will last longer, but for our needs this is perfect right now. I also bought myself a red raincoat and now we match on our walks-and are visible in traffic 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Some flaws, but great value
customer_reviews.text: This is my second of these coats. The convenience is really great. I like the fact that there’s no wrestling to shove head, or paws into sleeves or over head problems. The leash hole is a bit small though. Additionally, the hood doesn’t stay on very well, and the underside isn’t very well protected. This can be problematic with a feathery breed, like my golden. However, the packability is great, and as a cover, it does the job. It’s light weightt and adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a heck of a time getting one of these to fit my dog. I measured him and ordered the appropriate raincoat. It completely swallowed him. I sent it back and ordered the next size down. The XL does fit my dog better, but the hood is still too large and the velcro strap is not nearly long enough. The hole is made for leashes only. This coat is not able to be used with a harness. If we ever get another dog, I would go with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Cute rubber duckies
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for my Golden Retriever even though she's only 60 pounds I ordered the 2X size since it was cheaper but also wanted it to be bigger so it could cover more. It fits her really well actually and then I got another dog, a German Shephard and she is currently 60 pounds as well and still growing. It fits her perfectly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time buyer.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought one of these in the past for my mom's 2 year old 10 pound pomeranian and it worked extremely well. This time I needed one for my 7 month old 10 pound pomeranian and it works well. I got a small though I could've gotten away with buying an extra small. It comes with a little pouch that snaps closed with another snap piece attached for you to snap it onto a bag or something. The bottom of the rain jacket Velcros around your dogs bottom side and the neck piece snaps together when worn.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Great rain coat
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered an XL for my 60lb doodle. It was much too small. The strap below couldnt reach to close and the end of the coat was too short. Went one size up to XXL and everything fit perfectly except it was way too long and the wind would blow up the back and reveal half his back. I am just going to shorten it myself. In the photos, i folded it under itself to shorten it temporarily. Other than the drastic sizing difference, its a good coat overall. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline CTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rain coat for pups
customer_reviews.text: Originally my dog had an XXS and I liked it so much that I got a bigger size. Originally went with a large and had to return for medium, but the medium fits really well. The things I really like about this raincoat in particular are that the hood is actually large enough to go over a dog's head and ears. Also, it folds up into a little pocket that I leave attached to my leash, so when we are walking I always have access to the raincoat. The aqua is really fun and vibrant and it has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Unbearably cute, but snug.
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern, the idea, and the material. Typical nylon raincoat material, and definitely keeps her dry under it. However...1) our dog is 80#, with a german shepherd amount of fur, and the XXL barely clasps around her belly. One size up would be a lot better, but there isnt' a larger size. So if your dog is over 85#, or is stocky, you won't find one to fit. 2) the back keeps flopping forward in the wind. Could use with another strap farther back, but then I suppose you're have to have a girl/boy version. 3) the hood is very cute, but also just doesn't stay forward. A chin strap could be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: nalissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but flimsy and flaps around
customer_reviews.text: Being packable is a nice feature, but as others have noted, the material is quite thin and looks as if it wouldn't hold up well. The deal breaker for me, though, was that there's only one narrow velcro strap across the dog's belly, so the back end of the raincoat flaps around in even the mildest wind.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: I got XXL and they fit pretty well. One of the snaps ripped off one ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my border collies. I got XXL and they fit pretty well. One of the snaps ripped off one coat on the first use, but so far that has been the only defect. I've been using them regularly for about two months now, and they are very effective. My dogs tolerate them well and they help reduce the amount of toweling necessary after a walk in the rain. The hood is somewhat ineffective - it either covers my dogs' eyes or flops back to expose their necks - but other than that a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SigmaNu

customer_reviews.title: It almost fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: The coat does a great job of keeping my dog dry from the neck down. However he’s a terrier with a extra long back. Therefore I had to order a medium to cover his body but the hood is to big for his head. So I’ve tried different methods to cover his head but mostly I have to keep his head uncovered.
customer_reviews.author: Love To Read

customer_reviews.title: Not the most durable material
customer_reviews.text: The material is similar to a light poncho. The sizing itself is fairly accurate, but the style is a bit loose and there's no way to store the hood (puppy is not a fan of having his ears covered). It seems likely to snag the first time adventure puppy takes a detour into a shrub, which he's very fond of doing. The fabric is cute. I just hope we get a least a season of use out of it before it's destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: My frenchie and boston terrier look absolutely adorable (and ridiculous) in these, and I get lots of comments when I walk them in the rain. They're cute and prevent them from getting soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This poncho has a very cute print and keeps my girl from getting wet. There are definitely better doggy rain jackets- but for the low price, I think this poncho is worth it. A problem with the poncho is that the back is not secured down onto the dog in any way. So if there is even a little bit of wind, it will blow to the side or upwards. A solution I created was to take an extra collar I have for her and extend it so that it fits around her waist. I then clip the belt around her and the poncho.
customer_reviews.author: Pessimistic Penny

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really keep my dog dry. I have a Yorkshire mix and every time I walk him with this he ends up half wet and I have to give him a bath or dry him off. Not too surprising since it only covers half of my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Pretty IMPRESSED!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product over 2 years ago, used it on 2 (pitbulls) dogs, and live in PA where the rain is nearly 50 inches a year... And this product never let me down. When I opened it I wasn't so sure it would be worth it, but I was wrong. We've even taken many hikes in the woods with pointy branches and pickers and it's never gotten even a hole. I am impressed and would purchase again from here rather than in store because they are more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kool126aid

customer_reviews.title: Two paws up!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for a very finicky dog who already didn’t like to leash walk. He hates putting his feet into the sleeves of other coats and this one fastens one the bottom and is open which is perfect for easy on and off. A little flimsy but all and all I’m satisfied and so is my dog. Two paws up!
customer_reviews.author: MusicMovieGuy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is very thin. I like that it folds up into a very small size approx 4"x3"x1.5" and fits in my pocket. I have had a very good experience with RC Pets in the past (they sent me a new leash when the other one failed). I am removing one star because it is not worth the cost I paid ($12). The hood covers my dog's eyes so I will try to fold it a bit so she can see while keeping her head dry.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great little raincoats
customer_reviews.text: Putting this jacket on, is the only way one of my boys will go potty when it’s raining. They’re very comfortable and keep the tops of the dogs dry (even the head when the hood is up, though they aren’t huge fans because it’s hard for them to see). Only down side is that though I ordered two of the same size and color, they ended up being slightly different shades (slightly different material) and one is a little longer. It’s not a big deal and no one notices but me, so still 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: SydneeRoss

The rain poncho has a leash access hole and an adjustable velcro waist band. Lightweight coat is great for long-haired breeds that don’t need the added warmth. Hand washable and comes in variety of colors. Sizes range from xxs to xxxl. To view all of our products please visit our amazon store at www.amazon.com/RC-Pet-Products/
